title: endu dAcukonnAvu
sahitya:
endu dAcukonnAvu sundara shrI rAmacandra


anupallavi

  mundu venaka tOcalEdE mandu nA vidhi likitamunaku enduku nA mundu 
rAvu andamaina nIdu mOmu canduru jUpi kanulakAnanda monarimpavaiya
				(svara sAhitya)
dEvEsha lOkEsha munijana bhayahara nirupama lankAdipAri surEndrApta
shrI rAma triguNa rahita shubhayuta pada sarasija kali kaluSa haraNa
nrpavara nata bhrgu suta mada haraNa jalaja nayana yugaLa


caraNam    dAsa janula tappula dayatO mannincuTaku vEsaragayuNDu vADu 
vErevvaru nIvE kOsalapura nAyaka nI kOmalamagu caraNamunaku
Asa dhIra mrokkEra vAsavAdi pUjitA O sadAshiva kavi vinuta UrakuNDa 
mEragAdu nA samayamu telisi brOvu nAradanuta divya carita
